thread.title: Donald Trump postpones 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' appearance
thread.title_full: Donald Trump postpones 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' appearance - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Donald Trump postpones 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' appearance
text:
CHRIS KEANE/REUTERS A spokeswoman confirmed Donald Trump is backing out of his scheduled Tuesday night appearance on “Jimmy Kimmel Live.” Donald Trump has canceled his Tuesday night date with Jimmy Kimmel.
A Trump spokeswoman confirmed that the GOP front-runner is backing out of his scheduled appearance on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” — citing a “political obligation."
But the Trump mouthpiece told CNN Money The Donald is rescheduling his appearance and plans on being on the show in the next few weeks.
Kimmel broke the news on the Howard Stern show Tuesday morning.
There was no immediate word on who would replace the billionaire real estate mogul.
Randy Holmes/ABC via Getty Images There was no immediate word on who would replace the billionaire real estate mogul on Kimmel's show. NBC/NBCU Photo Bank Hillary Clinton talks to Jimmy Fallon last month. She's slated to appear on Fallon’s “Tonight Show” again Tuesday night.
The abrupt cancellation represents a tough blow for Kimmel who was counting on the attention-grabbing Trump to deliver big ratings.
Kimmel, a Brooklyn native, is back in town this week to film five episodes of his ABC show at Brooklyn Academy of Music's Howard Gilman Opera House.
Kimmel’s loss is likely Jimmy Fallon’s gain.
Hillary Clinton is slated to appear on Fallon’s “Tonight Show” Tuesday night.
